ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: Yah you do Shamans do not get bash as a melee skill they get it as a racial skill and it will never go up it stays at 1 point of damage at all time. I beleive
ygData.messageBody:
Yah you do Shamans do not get bash as a melee skill they get it as a racial
skill and it will never go up it stays at 1 point of damage at all time. I
beleive bards also get parry but I could be wrong. Not to mention track and
some other skills from the rogue.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, October 01, 1999 4:26 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..


>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Every Shaman in the game has as many melee skills as we do. They all get
>Slam=Bash and Dodge. We get Dodge and Dual wield. Using that logic does
>not work, we don't get more melee skills than all casters, pure or
>otherwise.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Naeeldar [mailto:jackal@...]
>Sent: Friday, October 01, 1999 2:18 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..
>
>
>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
>That's just the thing Verant is not usaing your definition they are using
>their definition which is a mix of class skills. Priests get none of the
>melee class skills the only skill they get is dodge for melee and the
>casting classes get that also. So like I said were not looking at it in
this
>light and neither is Verant.
>
>Naeeldar
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Lange, Stephen <SLANGE@...>
>To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Date: Friday, October 01, 1999 12:47 PM
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..
>
>
>>From: "Lange, Stephen" <SLANGE@...>
>>
>>They can were armor. An item a pure caster cannot wear. That in itself
>>makes them a hybrid. Heres a simplistic example:
>>
>>Black = Caster
>>White = Melee
>>Grey = Hybrid
>>
>>A hybrid shares some of each types characteristics.
>>
>>Wizard cant wear Plate but can cast spells = Black
>>Melee Can wear Plate but cant cast spells = White
>>Hybrid can wear plate or equivalent and can cast some spells = Grey
>>
>>Classes = Grey
>> Ranger
>> Shaman
>> Cleric
>> Druid
>> Bard
>> Paladin
>> ShadowKnight
>>
>>How can this logic be refuted when looked at in this light?
>>
>>
>>-----Original Message-----
>>From: Naeeldar [mailto:jackal@...]
>>Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 10:32 PM
>>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..
>>
>>
>>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>>Again I state why are Shamans and Clerics hybrids?
>>
>>Naeeldar
>>
>>-----Original Message-----
>>From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>>To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
>>Date: Thursday, September 30, 1999 4:38 PM
>>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..
>>
>>
>>>From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>>>
>>>At 02:16 PM 9/30/99 -0400, you wrote:
>>>>From: chlebek@...
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>> Its an interesting idea. And dont make assumptions for everyone else
on
>>the
>>>>> list, they mayt not be sick of it.
>>>>
>>>>Let's take a vote...
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>Me? I'm sick of it. We are hybrids. Verant has stated again and again
>>hybrids
>>>>will not get bind. Therefore WE will not get bind.
>>>
>>>Shamans are Hybrids, though... they get bind.... Come to think of it, so
>>>are Clerics...
>>>
>>>Talies
>>>
>>>>
>>
>>>
